title: Impact of Internet usage by Latinos on campaigns

content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.

Use the line charts above to answer the following questions.

Identify the percentage of bilingual Latino adults in the United States using the Internet in 2009.

Describe the most significant increase in Internet usage in chart B.

Draw a conclusion about how the increase identified in part B affects the trend in chart A.

Explain how a trend in chart B could influence campaign strategies after 2015.

frqParts.text:
